Detailed Description

This file declares the interface for configuring the device init. All Module, CLock and DPLL Init API interface .

Function Documentation

int32_t PMMC_CleanupFirmware ( void  )

Cleanup elements related to usage of the PM-dedicated firmware.

Returns
status Returns the status of the API. This can be the following values: PM_SUCCESS If the firmware cleanup completed successfully PM_FAIL If an error occurred during firmware cleanup
int32_t PMMC_ConfigFirmware ( const void *  pImage,
uint32_t  imageSize 
)

Configure firmware on processors dedicated to power management.

Parameters
pImagePointer to firmware image to be loaded onto processor
imageSizeSize of image in bytes
Returns
status Returns the status of the API. This can be the following values: PM_SUCCESS If the firmware was loaded and configured successfully PM_FAIL If an error occurred during firmware load and configure
int32_t PMMC_InitModulePowerState ( )

Configures the system modules to desired Power State .

Returns
status Returns the status of the API. This can be the following values: PM_SUCCESS If the desired power state was met. PM_FAIL If the desired power state was not met.
